Description:
This detection excludes known namped pipes accessible remotely and notify on newly observed ones, may help to detect lateral movement and remote exec using named pipes

Author: Samir Bousseaden, @neu5ron, Tim Shelton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: First Time Seen Remote Named Pipe - Zeek
Query: sourcetype='zeek-smb_files' eql select * from _source_ where (path = '\\\\\*\\ipc$' and  not (log like '%samr%' or log like '%lsarpc%' or log like '%winreg%' or log like '%netlogon%' or log like '%srvsvc%' or log like '%protected_storage%' or log like '%wkssvc%' or log like '%browser%' or log like '%netdfs%' or log like '%svcctl%' or log like '%spoolss%' or log like '%ntsvcs%' or log like '%lsm_api_service%' or log like '%hydralspipe%' or log like '%termsrv_api_service%' or log like '%msftewds%'))
